title: Herb Stuffing Recipe | McCormick
description: Looking for the perfect Thanksgiving stuffing? Try our savory oven-baked stuffing recipe made with a tasty blend of thyme, black pepper and poultry seasoning.
cleaned_text: What's a [Thanksgiving feast](https://www.mccormick.com/thanksgiving)without a delicious homemade stuffing? This herb stuffing recipe is made with a simple yet flavorful blend of [poultry seasoning](https://www.mccormick.com/en/spices-and-flavors/herbs-and-spices/spices/poultry-seasoning), [thyme](https://www.mccormick.com/en/spices-and-flavors/herbs-and-spices/spices/thyme-leaves), and [black pepper](https://www.mccormick.com/en/spices-and-flavors/herbs-and-spices/spices/black-pepper-ground)for a holiday side dish that's sure to please. This herb stuffing recipe is made with a simple yet flavorful blend of [poultry seasoning](https://www.mccormick.com/en/spices-and-flavors/herbs-and-spices/spices/poultry-seasoning), [thyme](https://www.mccormick.com/en/spices-and-flavors/herbs-and-spices/spices/thyme-leaves), and [black pepper](https://www.mccormick.com/en/spices-and-flavors/herbs-and-spices/spices/black-pepper-ground)for a holiday side dish that's sure to please. Our homemade herb stuffing even uses store-bought bread cubes to eliminate the step of slicing and drying out the bread. Interested in trying other stuffing recipes? Explore some of our other sweet and h of sweetness and texture makes the classic that much better. 15m PREP TIME 40m COOK TIME 179 CALORIES 9 INGREDIENTS Ingredients 18 Servings - 1 cup (2 sticks) butter - 2 cups chopped celery - 1 cup chopped onion - 2 teaspoons [McCormick® Whole Thyme Leaves](/spices-and-flavors/herbs-and-spices/spices/thyme-leaves) - 1 1/2 teaspoons [McCormick® Poultry Seasoning](/spices-and-flavors/herbs-and-spices/spices/poultry-seasoning) - 1 teaspoon [Lawry's® Seasoned Salt](/lawrys/flavors/spice-blends/seasoned-salt) - 1/2 teaspoon [McCormick® Pure Ground Black Pepper](/spices-and-flavors/herbs-and-spices/spices/black-pepper-ground) - 12 cups dry unseasoned bread cubes - 4 cups chicken broth INSTRUCTIONS - 1 How to Make Classic Herb Stuffing Preheat oven to 375°F. Melt butter in large skillet on medium heat. Add celery and onion; cook and stir 5 minutes. Stir in thyme, poultry seasoning, seasoned salt and pepper. - 2 Place bread cubes in large bowl. Add celery mixture and broth; toss gently until well mixed. Spoon into lightly greased 13x9-inch baking dish. - 3 Bake 35 minutes or until heated through and lightly browned.
